markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Well-Met Traveler](/Feats.aspx?ID=5549) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You naturally adopt a pleasant and affable demeanor when meeting others. You are trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39). If you would automatically become trained in Diplomacy (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

 In addition, you gain the [Hobnobber](/Feats.aspx?ID=5157) skill feat.
name: Well-Met Traveler

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Well-Met Traveler Source Player Core 2 pg. 10 1.1 --- You naturally adopt a pleasant and affable demeanor when meeting others. You are trained in Diplomacy. If you would automatically become trained in Diplomacy (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. In addition, you gain the Hobnobber skill feat.
